channel.title: PS3 vs Xbox360
channel.description:
I bought a PS3 for 280€, and at the time I went to buy it Xbox360 with 2 games(Crysis 2 and some car game) was around 200€, I just want to know if I made the right decision. So give me the facts of good sides and bad sides of both consoles, I don't want any fanboys here talking bullshit of their favourite console.
Oh and I just wanna share with you this, I bought the PS3 for 280€, and the next day it was 200€ with cruise on top of it, I was so fucking pissed off.

item.title: PS3 vs Xbox360
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:37, topic:437841”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=540560.msg3963627#msg3963627 date=1333500787]

They both bow to the obviously superior PC!

P.S. You can also install Linux onto a PS3.

You can install linux on a GBC…
[/quote]

Oh yes. It’s extremely difficult to install to an Xbox360, though. So I sold mine.

I’ve never had a PS3 but my Xbox360 experience was mediocre. It’s so proprietary compared to the other systems. It’s like the Mac of the gaming consoles.[/quote]

More like the Windows of the gaming consoles lol.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 vs Xbox360
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“ollie123, post:38, topic:437841”]Unless you’re interested in the console exclusive games, save up and build a great gaming PC. Contrary to popular belief, a decent gaming PC will destroy any console in terms of performance. And did I mention that you can get games dirt cheap on Steam?

If you have to console, go with the PS3.[/quote]
I do have a gaming PC, there’s no game I can’t run but the reason why I don’t play on PC anymore is that there’s too much cheaters on every multiplayer you play…

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 vs Xbox360
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Dj_:

You tip/kick/drop your xbox when playing a game an instant laser burn. happened to both my mw3’s. so I’d say Xbox.

…What? Contradiction much?

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 vs Xbox360
item.dc:creator: @Djayboi6 Dj_
item.description:
@Djayboi6 wrote:

I own both systems, ps3 is great for free online but requires broadband connection and lacks decent features, xbox360 has great features but they put little to no effort in certain parts of the system, like the disk drive. You tip/kick/drop your xbox when playing a game an instant laser burn. happened to both my mw3’s. so I’d say Xbox.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 vs Xbox360
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:31, topic:437841"][quote author=Dunder Mifflin link=topic=540560.msg3960458#msg3960458 date=1333234609]
360 all the way. Once it gets a browser, not even free memebrship will be a strong enough pro for a ps3. when xbox gets a browser, all hells gon break loose nikka
[/quote]
Wait a second…What the fuck do you do with a browser on a gaming console? Because that’s why we have computers…[/quote]

PS3s have browsers.

Also, PS3s are compatible with most forms of USB port hardware. And PS3 controllers can be used on the computer.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 vs Xbox360
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:27, topic:437841”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=540560.msg3959713#msg3959713 date=1333156680]

200+60x (x=year owned) or 280. You’re choice.

I dont buy 60$ games when i go to GameStop or whatever, i buy the cheap 20$ games, and if i dont like them i return them.

The ‘60’ represents the cost of xbox live per year. It’s $60/year.

Not everybody needs live, I’d handle without it.

Maybe so, but would you RATHER live without it?

Yes. Extra 60$ for more games =D
[/quote]
And a million less hours of playtime on every game you have… In every game, you eventually get bored of playing offline. Online is the far better alternative, that isn’t even open for debate here.[/quote]
Not if the games i play usually dont have an online feature, since i play alot of RPGs

Read full topic

I don’t understand how you guys can have more than 3 games. I have 1 first person shooter(COD Black Ops), 1 sports game (Madden), and one rpg (Skyrim). (All of these are available on PS3 and Xbox)

Don’t get why people buy 20 different games.
[/quote]Because i enjoy lots of different games?[/quote]

Where do you find the time?

Why not have more than 3 games? The console is useless if you play 3 games only. I’m gonna buy the MGS HD collection along with MGS1 from PS Store, then I go for all the resident evil games for PS systems, dunno what I buy after that though :o
